CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 服务；供应；上菜；端上；提供；送达（法律文件）；满足（需求）；实现（目标）；发球；操作（机器等）；服役；服刑；坐牢；执行（任务）；担任（职务）；为…工作；任期为；值班；可用作；对…有用；起作用；产生…的效果

synonym.mean: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用
服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有用的，可供使用的；耐用的
发球员；服伺者；服勤者；伺候者
可用性，适用性；使用可靠性；[计] 可服务性；可维修性

word_group.brief_definition: 作为, 充当, 担任
侍奉二主(同时支持两个敌对的党派), 徘徊于两种对立原则之间

bilingual.source: She wanted to serve the women and children at home.
bilingual.target: 她想为国内的妇女和儿童服务。

bilingual.source: Due to Han Gan's natural talent and years of hard work, he was eventually chosen to serve Emperor Xuanzong in the royal palace.
bilingual.target: 由于韩干的天赋和多年的努力，他最终被选中在皇宫里为玄宗皇帝服务。
她入伍是为了服务国家。
志愿者们无私地为人民服务。

bilingual.source: The busboy helped the waiter serve the dishes.
bilingual.target: 餐厅勤杂工帮助服务员上菜。

bilingual.source: He has always been striving to serve the people.
bilingual.target: 他一直在努力为人民服务。

bilingual.source: The volunteers serve in the community every day.
bilingual.target: 志愿军每天都在社区服务。

bilingual.source: He decided to join the army to serve his country.
bilingual.target: 他决定入伍，为国家服务。

bilingual.source: He took an oath to serve his country faithfully.
bilingual.target: 他宣誓要忠诚地为国家服务。

yingyinNormal.en: We no longer serve you. We serve only us. May the fittest survive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不会再为你们服务。我们只为我们自己服务。适者生存。

yingyinNormal.en: The only way for us to serve you is to give you the means to serve yourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 政府为人民服务的唯一办法就是想办法让你们服务自己。

yingyinNormal.en: As a nation, as Americans to serve them as well as they have always served us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为一个国家，作为美国人，服务于他们正如他们一直服务于我们一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then I will be honored to serve you, my queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么...很荣幸为您服务，女王陛下。

yingyinNormal.en: I am just a bookkeeper. I tally. I account. I serve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是个簿记员，我只计数，计算，为大汗服务。

yingyinNormal.en: We say we're here to serve you, when in fact, we're serving ourselves. And why? We are driven by our own desire to get reelected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们说为人民服务，但其实，我们为自己服务，为什么，因为我们只想着连任。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Bradshaw? Oh, that's me. I am Gaurau. I will be here to serve you. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布莱德肖小姐。是我。我是高鲁，为您服务。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, we've got the pink badges! I'm sorry, we can only serve Premier Badge holders.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有粉色的徽章。抱歉，我们只服务贵宾徽章会员。

yingyinNormal.en: Before we lift a fork we lend a hand by going out in the community to serve some of our neighbors in need.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们就餐前，我们会到社区中做义工为一些需要的邻居们服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, it's in our contract to serve on a university committee. And frankly, this is one I believe in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们与学校的合约中注明了得为大学委员会服务，老实说，我也认同这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: And so, as our troops continue to transition back home back to our businesses, our schools, our congregations, and our communities, it's up to all of us to serve them as well as they have served us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，当我们的军人陆续地回到国内，回到我们的商界，我们的学校，我们的教会和我们的社区，现在是我们所有人服务于他们，正如他们曾经服务我们一样。

yingyinNormal.en: 15 years ago, 18 founders in my apartment had a dream, that someday, we can build up a company that can serve millions of small business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 15年前，在我的公寓里，十八位创始人有了一个梦，这个梦想就是，在某一天我们能够创立一个为成千上万小企业主服务的公司。

yingyinNormal.en: We are grateful to the countless Americans who serve their communities in soup kitchens and shelters looking out for those who are less fortunate and lifting up those who have fallen on hard times.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们感恩无数在救济站和避难所服务于他们社区的国人，他们照料着不是那么幸运的人们，扶助着那些陷入困苦生活的人们。

yingyinNormal.en: You serve the Lord. And through Him, you serve others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你效忠主通过他效忠众生。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, it's ready to serve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以上菜了。

yingyinNormal.en: You really serve people sneezers? Well, I don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的会在咖啡里加胡椒？不会。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't serve in the Kings-guard with one hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一只手无法胜任御林铁卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Gorgeous. Serve with creme fraiche and orange zest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很漂亮，配上鲜奶油和橙汁。

yingyinNormal.en: Next, slice some spring onions, then we're ready to serve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着，切一些葱，然后就可以装盘了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not your duty to serve this country alone, and it better not be your goal to simply serve yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不必一个人效忠国家，也最好不要只想着效忠自己。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: help people to food or drink or set out helpings of food or drink

examination_example.sentence: Such policies are largely self-<highlight>serving</highlight> measures that make their sponsors feel good but do little to help average women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种政策在很大程度上是自私的措施，让发起者感觉良好，但对普通女性帮助不大。

examination_example.sentence: Small businesses and internet entrepreneurs are not well <highlight>served</highlight> at all by this decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一决定对小企业和互联网企业家完全没有好处。

examination_example.sentence: Keeping outsiders out of a law firm isolates lawyers from the pressure to make money rather than <highlight>serve</highlight> clients ethically.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将局外人排除在律师事务所之外，将律师从赚钱的压力中分离开来，而不是从道德上为客户服务。

sense_info_list.en: be of use in achieving or satisfying

examination_example.sentence: But I believe that well-run zoos and the heroic animals that suffer their captivity so <highlight>serve</highlight> a higher purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我相信，经营良好的动物园和遭受囚禁的英勇动物有着更高的目的。

examination_example.sentence: There has been a kind of revival or a rethinking about what guilt is and what role guilt can <highlight>serve</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于什么是内疚以及内疚能起到什么作用，已经有了一种复兴或反思。

examination_example.sentence: DNT may not <highlight>serve</highlight> its intended purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: DNT可能无法实现其预期目的。

examination_example.sentence: Marris distorts our findings which actually prove that zoos <highlight>serve</highlight> as an indispensable link between man and nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马里斯歪曲了我们的研究结果，事实证明动物园是人与自然之间不可或缺的纽带。

examination_example.sentence: California's plan should <highlight>serve</highlight> as a model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州的计划应该成为一个典范。

examination_example.sentence: The networked computer is an amazing device, the first media machine that <highlight>serves</highlight> as the mode of production.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 网络计算机是不可思议的装置，是第一台作为生产模式的媒体机器。

sense_info_list.en: to spend a period of time in a particular job or training for a job

examination_example.sentence: Without increasing the pool of qualified women to <highlight>serve</highlight> on such boards has led to a "golden skirt" phenomenon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不增加合格女性在董事会任职的数量，就会导致一种“金裙子”现象。

examination_example.sentence: To the men and women who <highlight>served</highlight> in World War Ⅱ, the G.I. was the common man grown into hero.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于在第二次世界大战中服役的男男女女来说，美国大兵是成长为英雄的普通人。

examination_example.sentence: Doubtless a piece of boiled beef can always be <highlight>served</highlight> up on Sunday alongside some steamed vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，一块水煮牛肉总是可以在周日和一些蒸蔬菜一起上桌。

sense_info_list.en: be in prison for or during (a period of time)
deliver (a document such as a summons or writ) in a formal manner to the person to whom it is addressed

word_usage.usage: serve可用作双宾语动词，表示“给某人提供、端上……”可以说serve sth. to sb.或serve sb. sth.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 可用作; 可当...使(尤指别无选择时)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 自助的；自选的；自动售货的；自己操作的
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: help people to food or drink or set out helpings of food or drink

examination_example.sentence: How do such behaviors <highlight>serve</highlight> us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种行为如何为我们服务？

examination_example.sentence: He was unable to break with authority, and <highlight>served</highlight> Mussolini faithfully until the day he died.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他无法脱离权威，忠诚地为墨索里尼服务，直到去世。

sense_info_list.en: be sufficient; be adequate, either in quality or quantity

examination_example.sentence: We're <highlight>served</highlight> up an endless stream of advice on "how to survive your 40s".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们源源不断地收到了关于“如何度过40多岁”的建议。

examination_example.sentence: The plight of the king penguin should <highlight>serve</highlight> as a warning about the future of the entire marine environment in the Antarctic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帝企鹅的困境应该成为对南极整个海洋环境未来的一个警告。

examination_example.sentence: The robot itself doesn't have to engage directly—it can <highlight>serve</highlight> as an intermediary for human communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人本身并不一定要直接参与，它可以作为人类交流的中介。

sense_info_list.zh: 可用作; 可当...使(尤指别无选择时)

examination_example.sentence: However, if the findings are true, they suggest that optimism could <highlight>serve</highlight> as a psychological trait that promotes health and a longer life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果这些发现是真的，它们表明，乐观可以作为一种促进健康和长寿的心理特征。

sense_info_list.en: be in prison for or during (a period of time)

word_usage.usage: serve是及物动词，“为人民服务”可翻译为serve people，不可翻译为serve for people。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 提供服务者；服务员；计算机网络服务器；发球者；服务生；弥撒中的助祭
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: help people to food or drink or set out helpings of food or drink

examination_example.sentence: Nearly all of them <highlight>serve</highlight> the purpose of the funders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们几乎都是为资助者服务的。

examination_example.sentence: An angry customer had thrown a chicken at his head after complaining about how long she had waited to be <highlight>served</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位愤怒的顾客在抱怨她等了多久才上菜后，把一只鸡扔到了他的头上。

examination_example.sentence: The federal Head Start program, launched 50 years ago, has <highlight>served</highlight> more than 30 million children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 50年前启动的联邦启智计划已经为3000多万儿童提供了服务。

examination_example.sentence: Why does the woman say it is a good idea to <highlight>serve</highlight> foods that guests can help themselves to?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么女士说提供客人可以自己取用的食物是个好主意？

examination_example.sentence: The menu rule only applies to restaurants that <highlight>serve</highlight> standardised portion sizes and have fifteen or more locations nationwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 菜单规则仅适用于提供标准化份量的餐厅，并且在全国范围内有15个或更多的位置。

sense_info_list.en: be sufficient; be adequate; either in quality or quantity

examination_example.sentence: The criticism is directed at the British Airports Authority, which runs seven major airports, including the three main ones <highlight>serving</highlight> in London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批评针对的是英国机场管理局，该管理局运营着七个主要机场，其中包括在伦敦运行的三个主要机场。

examination_example.sentence: The Olympic suffered two crashes with other ships and went on to <highlight>serve</highlight> as a hospital ship and troop transport in World War I.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥林匹克号与其他船发生过两次相撞事件，但接着仍然在第一次世界大战中充当了医疗船和军队运输船。

examination_example.sentence: Either the chairman or the director of graduate studies <highlight>serves</highlight> for at least the first semester as a new student adviser.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主席或研究生学习主任至少在第一学期担任新的学生顾问。

examination_example.sentence: These maker spaces are often outside of classrooms, and are <highlight>serving</highlight> an important educational function.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些创客空间通常设于教室之外，发挥着重要的教育作用。

examination_example.sentence: Most recognizable of the ship designs are the ship's smoke stacks, but the fourth stack was actually just artistic in nature and <highlight>served</highlight> no functional purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邮船设计中最容易识别的是船舶的烟囱，但第4个烟囱实际上仅仅是艺术装饰，并没有其他功能。

examination_example.sentence: When it's time to make the leap, they take action and immediately drop what's no longer <highlight>serving</highlight> their purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当需要实现飞跃的时候，他们会采取行动，并立即放弃那些不再对他们有用的东西。

word_usage.usage: serve是及物动词，“为人民服务”可翻译为serve people，不可翻译为serve for people。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 提供服务者；服务员；计算机网络服务器；发球者；服务生；弥撒中的助祭
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

examination_example.sentence: Emotional intelligence, with its focus on both head and heart, may <highlight>serve</highlight> to point us in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商既关注头脑，也关注内心，可能会为我们指明正确的方向。

examination_example.sentence: I saw him leaving behind the layer that no longer <highlight>served</highlight> him, just as our lizard had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看见他舍弃了不再对自己有益的那层（外衣），就像我们的蜥蜴（蜕皮）一样。

examination_example.sentence: I managed to get an A in that course and learned life lessons that have <highlight>served</highlight> me well beyond the classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我努力在那门课上得了A，并学到了一些生活经验，这些经验对我的帮助远远超出了课堂。

examination_example.sentence: Our bar is open all day, and <highlight>serves</highlight> cocktails, coffee, beer, and white wine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的酒吧全天营业，供应鸡尾酒、咖啡、啤酒和白葡萄酒。

sense_info_list.en: help people to food or drink or set out helpings of food or drink

examination_example.sentence: The popularization of emotional intelligence has helped both the public and researchers re-evaluate how they <highlight>serve</highlight> people adaptively in everyday life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商的普及帮助公众和研究人员重新评估情商在日常生活中如何为人们提供适应性服务。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 自助的；自选的；自动售货的；自己操作的
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 提供服务者；服务员；计算机网络服务器；发球者；服务生；弥撒中的助祭
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: help people to food or drink or set out helpings of food or drink

examination_example.sentence: I want to be one of them and <highlight>serve</highlight> our country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想成为他们中的一员，为我们的国家服务。

examination_example.sentence: The job will include setting and clearing tables, <highlight>serving</highlight> customers and helping in the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作将包括摆放和清理桌子、为顾客提供服务以及在厨房帮忙。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>served</highlight> them like other waiters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他像其他侍者一样招待他们。

examination_example.sentence: Ardern said while she was <highlight>serving</highlight> up lunch at a school in Hawke's Bay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ardern说，当时她正在霍克湾的一所学校供应午餐。

examination_example.sentence: Restaurants only <highlight>served</highlight> food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 餐馆只供应食物。

examination_example.sentence: The countryside was full of inns that would <highlight>serve</highlight> food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乡下到处都是提供餐食的小旅馆。

sense_info_list.en: to be suitable for a particular use, especially when nothing else is available

examination_example.sentence: Now it has greatly helped the local people by bringing water to them and <highlight>serves</highlight> as the lifeline for the county.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，它给当地人民带来了水，极大地帮助了他们，并成为该县的生命线。

examination_example.sentence: Experts have said that the robots would enter production and <highlight>serve</highlight> as part of the national earthquake rescue team as soon as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家表示，这些机器人将尽快投入生产，并成为国家地震救援队的一员。

examination_example.sentence: These impressive results should <highlight>serve</highlight> as an example for other developing countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些令人印象深刻的结果应该成为其他发展中国家的榜样。

sense_info_list.en: be in prison for or during (a period of time)

word_usage.usage: serve是及物动词，“为人民服务”可翻译为serve people，不可翻译为serve for people。
